citations.narrative:
The facility has been conducting regulated activities without a license. Throughout June, July and August 2023, the
individual has engaged in exhibition of water buffalo, a covered species, at numerous petting zoos. Records from a
regulated broker document that the individual also sold a zebu, mini zebu, and yak in November 2022. Additional records
indicate that the individual sold a water buffalo in August 2023. While conducting a search on 9/12/2023, the individual
confirmed that she has performed the above mentioned activities.
A facility performing regulated activities with AWA covered species must obtain a license from USDA Animal Care to
ensure the humane care of animals covered by the regulations. No person shall operate as a dealer or exhibitor without a
valid license.
Correct by applying for the appropriate USDA Animal Care license type and discontinuing covered activities until a USDA
license has been obtained.
No regulated activities may be conducted until a USDA license is obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
